marklogic.body:
It's not helping when those calories are completely void of nutritional benefit. Bodies would hang on to more of the fat content if one is eating and not getting any value out of it by thinking that it is actually starving.Â That plus increases appetite and suppression of that "full" feeling by these non-foods just make you eat even more in a futile attempt at satisfaction.Â Then your energy goes down and you can't get yourself to become active to Burn Off the garbage.Â
It's a vicious cycle, that junk food.
